text: Viry-Châtillon is a commune. It is in Île-de-France in the Essonne department in north France. In 2020, 31,098 people lived in Viry-Châtillon. The commune is in the southern suburbs of Paris, from the center. == Twin towns == Viry- Châtillon is twinned with: * Erftstadt, Germany * Wokingham, England, United Kingdom == Other websites == * Official website Category:Communes in Essonne
title: Viry-Châtillon
